title: Classic Marble Games
description: Aggies, cat's eyes, and steelies! How well do you remember the world of marbles that kept children entertained for generations?

questions.question: What was the name for a marble made of real agate stone, prized by collectors?
In the most common marble game, 'Ringer,' what shape was drawn on the ground to play?
What was the larger marble used to shoot at smaller marbles called?
When playing marbles 'for keeps,' what did the winner get to do?
options: Make the rules for the next game
Go first in the next round
Keep the marbles they knocked out of the ring
